name: Energy Peat Europe
headAddress: c/o Aula Europe. Rue Charles Martel 63
goal: The general objective of the Association is to promote the use of energy peat and peat energy in energy sector and to study all matters of common interest, in particular the technical, educational, socio-economic, biodiversity including after-use matters, organizational and legislative developments in the peat production, in energy peat usage and in local energy sector in general, and to seek and realize solutions on an international basis.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Energy Union, Electricity Markets, Climate Policy, Air Quality, Renewable Energy, Biomass Sustainability.
